conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What is the focus of the Computer Science & AI department at UTN?
The department focuses on interdisciplinary collaboration in engineering and science, particularly in AI and robotics, with strong ties to the Liberal Arts and Social Science department.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who is the Founding Chair of the Computer Science & AI department?
Prof. Dr. Wolfram Burgard, a renowned expert in AI and robotics, serves as the Founding Chair. He previously held a professorship at the University of Freiburg.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, what are Prof. Burgard’s research interests?
His work combines robotics and AI, focusing on mobile robots, motion planning, localization, and probabilistic robotics.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Has Prof. Burgard received any major awards?
Yes, he won the Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz-Prize (2009), an ERC Advanced Grant (2010), and an IEEE Technical Field Award (2021), among others.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where can I find Prof. Burgard’s publications?
His work is listed on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=zj6FavAAAAAJ) and [dblp](https://dblp.org/pid/b/WolframBurgard.html).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What labs are part of the department?
Labs include AI & Robotics, Computer Vision & Machine Perception, Natural Language Understanding, and Natural Language Learning & Generation.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Are there any Master’s programs offered?

Yes! The M.Sc. in Artificial Intelligence and Robotics launches in October 2023, covering AI, machine learning, computer vision, and more. [Learn more here](https://www.utn.de/en/study/ai-robotics-en/).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Does the department collaborate with other fields?
Absolutely. It promotes cross-disciplinary research and teaching, including partnerships with Liberal Arts and Social Sciences.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who are some key professors in the AI & Robotics Lab?
Prof. Burgard, Prof. Jahnke, Prof. Kipf, Prof. Walter, and Prof. Grabocka lead this lab.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s unique about the department’s structure?

It’s organized into specialized labs that encourage collaboration and innovation across research areas.

How can I apply for the M.Sc. in AI & Robotics?
Visit the program’s [official page](https://www.utn.de/en/study/ai-robotics-en/) for application details.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Are there scholarships available for international students?
The text doesn’t specify, but check UTN’s [career page](https://www.utn.de/en/career/opportunities-for-doctoral-researcher/) for funding opportunities.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s Prof. Burgard’s role in IEEE?
He served as president of the IEEE Robotics and Automation Society (2018–2019) and is an IEEE Fellow.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I work on mobile robots during the Master’s?
Yes! The program includes mobile robot navigation and AI—key focuses of Prof. Burgard’s research.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is there a list of faculty contacts?

Links to professors’ profiles are provided (e.g., [Prof. Burgard](https://www.utn.de/person/wolfram-burgard/)).

Hi! What’s the vibe of the department?
It’s collaborative and innovative, with labs designed to spark interdisciplinary breakthroughs in AI and engineering.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Did Prof. Burgard write any books?
Yes! *Principles of Robot Motion* (2005) on motion planning and *Probabilistic Robotics* on handling uncertainty in robots.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Are there PhD opportunities here?
Check the [career page](https://www.utn.de/en/career/opportunities-for-doctoral-researcher/) for doctoral researcher openings.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s the BrainLinks-BrainTools cluster?
Prof. Burgard coordinated this German Research Foundation-funded excellence cluster (2012–2019) linking AI and neuroscience.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who should I contact for admissions questions?

Reach out to the department team (e.g., [Andrea Smith](https://www.utn.de/person/andrea-smith/)) or visit the program page.
